headline: Trane Technologies plc (TT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Trane Technologies plc on The Wealth Dynasty Report’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on TT. Trane Technologies plc’s share was trading at $454.76 as of February 6th. TT’s trailing and forward P/E were 34.61 and 30.86 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
